sourcesContent:
import { Component } from "@angular/core"; import { FormGroup, FormControl, Validators, FormBuilder, ReactiveFormsModule } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: "app-items-itemform", templateUrl: "./itemform.component.html" }) export class ItemformComponent { itemForm: FormGroup; constructor(private _formbuilder: FormBuilder) { this.itemForm = _formbuilder.group({ category: ['', Validators.required], location: ['', Validators.required], rooms: [1, Validators.required], area: [0, Validators.required], renting: [0, Validators.required], description: [''], imageUrl: [''] }); } onSubmit() { console.log("ItemCreate form submitted"); console.log(this.itemForm); console.log('The Item' + this.itemForm.value.category + 'is created.'); console.log(this.itemForm.touched); } }

Create A new Item
